generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings, extending into the distance with cars driving on it.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Several buildings are visible along both sides of the road, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and some shrubs are present along the sidewalks and road edges.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible along the sidewalks and between the road and buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a black sedan in the foreground and several others parked or driving.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- traffic sign: A red circular traffic sign (indicating "No Entry") is visible on the left side of the road.
- fence: A fence is visible along the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
